parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Switches collision lights of a vehicle on/off.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[setCollisionLight]] set

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> set: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
 
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>heli [[setCollisionLight]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isLightOn]], [[isCollisionLightOn]], [[setPilotLight]], [[isIRLaserOn]], [[engineOn]], [[isEngineOn]]
</value></part></template></root>
